turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry what did you say?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so that's a cappuccino with soy milk, anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry I didn't hear that please speak up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great. So I have a tall Cappuccino with Soy milk right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where should I send the order to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you book it for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have a tall cappuccino with soy milk. Where should I send the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where should I send your order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I'll send it to the starbucks on Charleston street, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready in 15 minutes.
